amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the prohibition on the Secretary of Education from ever promulgating or enforcing any regulation or rule defining the term "credit hour".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 112-404 to strike the prohibition on the Secretary of Education from ever promulgating or enforcing any regulation or rule defining the term "credit hour".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (NY) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 255 (Roll no. 76).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Bishop (NY) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 255 (Roll no. 76).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Bishop (NY).
